hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #at the Desert Colossus#, skulltulas at night hold...^ #a Map of the Spirit Temple# and #Cojiro#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides the #Lon Lon Tower#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Deku Stick#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #the Requiem of Spirit#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that on the path to the #right hand of the Spirit Temple# a chest and a spider hold...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Sun Block Room Chest
Spirit Temple GS Hall After Sun Block Room

GC (Maze).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides #Damp√©'s Hut#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that ##Goron City## has #0# major items.

HC (Malon).text: They say that a lone #scrub in Death Mountain Crater# sells #a Red Rupee#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: Save your future, end the Happy Mask Salesman.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: What do you call a group of Gorons?^${12 39 C7}A rock band.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #inside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say Goron fabrics protect against more than fire.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the path of #time#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that a spider under a #crate in the crater# holds #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #the Eyedrops#.
